The Qurâ€™an researcher, we have the last and the first, that is, the total behavior in them, so that we do not create, so we will do in them what we create from the actions that are from its sentences, what is mentioned in it, or whoever is given to us.So we are the one who is in the face of it, and we have this guidance, or that we have everything in the two households, so we do not harm us.Your misfortune; Whoever is in the way, but he guides himself and whoever is lost, but he is misled by it.
